MagicPotion:ReiMu.NAME: Magic Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: Set your [E] to the amount it was at the start of this turn. NL Gain #b1 energy at the start of your next #b

DESCRIPTIONS: to all stackable debuffs (e.g. Weak, Vulnerable) on the target.

HakureiPotion:ReiMu.NAME: Hakurei Potion
DESCRIPTIONS: to all stackable buffs (e.g. Strength, Dexterity) on you.
